name: Timber Block Puzzle - Fun Game
description:
Timber Block Puzzle is a fantastic puzzle game. And it’s FREE!

A SIMPLE and EASY game to play for everyone in ALL AGES.
You DRAG and DROP those blocks to fill any horizontal and vertical lines to score.
It’s all in woody style and no color match with UNLIMITED time.
Accept the brain-tease and LOVE the challenge!

FEATURES

• Simple and addictive gameplay.
• Relaxing block puzzle with woody style and sound.
• You can play with unlimited time so enjoy all the hours.
• Can play on both phones and tablets.
• Block puzzle help you practice logical and strategic thinking.
• There is a 10x10 grid for you to enjoy the fun.
• FREE wood block puzzle game.
• If you love solving puzzle and challenge, you will love this.
• This ‘Timber’ wood block puzzle provides challenge for your brain.
• There is no color match, all in one color so that you will focus and no distraction.
• It’s healthy and suitable for all age.

HOW TO PLAY

• You drag one block from outside to the grid to create horizontal or vertical lines of ten.
• There is no color match, no timer which means you can play forever with unlimited time and NO PRESSURE.
• Score as much as possible, continue on breaking the record and have the high score.
• You can share your score to your friends.
• SURPRISE everyone, show them how smart and good you are!
